alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued December 20 at 2:31AM MST until December 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...The Wind River Basin. Natrona County as well as the Green and Rattlesnake Mountains.. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A period of snow on Wednesday will bring a 1 to 3 inches of accumulation and bring difficult travel conditions with snow and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
